segments.text: Hey , buddy , can ’ t you see there ’ s a line ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry . I didn ’ t know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? You haven ’ t taken the bus before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you have to wait in line like everyone else . Besides , you should let old people on first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s all right . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanted to see the White House .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , well you don ’ t want this bus , anyway . It goes to Georgetown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s all right , though . Just get off at the next stop and catch the 79A .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , well thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
